input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Decorative Collection 9 ft. Cozy Christmas Garland with Red and Clear Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 Multicolored LED Lights and Berries'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 18' Outdoor White Berry Cypress Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6ft. Snow Tipped Christmas Artificial Garland with 35 Clear LED Lights and Pine Cones'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9' Frosted Faux Boxwood Christmas Garland with Red Berries'
  - Name='Christmas Time 7.5-ft. Pennsylvania Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9 Ft. Foxtail Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Sullivans 9' Artificial Mixed Pine Christmas Garland with Pinecones and Berries'
  - Name='12'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Ashcroft 6' Pre-Lit Cashmere Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Decorative Collection 9 ft. Cozy Christmas Garland with Red and Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and length, pre-lit garland with LED lights though colors differ, likely similar construction and use, relevant but slightly different lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 Multicolored LED Lights and Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, shorter length, pre-lit with LED lights but multicolored and with berries, less similar branch composition, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 18' Outdoor White Berry Cypress Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, much longer length, cypress branch type instead of pine, outdoor use matches but aesthetic and materials differ, somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6ft. Snow Tipped Christmas Artificial Garland with 35 Clear LED Lights and Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, shorter length, pre-lit with clear LED lights, includes pine cones like reference, snowy tip instead of cashmere bristle tips, fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9' Frosted Faux Boxwood Christmas Garland with Red Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different branch type (boxwood vs pine), presence of frost and berries significantly alters look, although same length, lower relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time 7.5-ft. Pennsylvania Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Product is a tree, not a garland, though pine is common, very different product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9 Ft. Foxtail Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree, not a garland, despite similar pine variation and length, low relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans 9' Artificial Mixed Pine Christmas Garland with Pinecones and Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and garland type, mixed pine branches with pinecones and berries, but different brand and no light mention, moderately relevant.
Extremely short length (12 inches) though lit and faux pine garland, length makes it less functionally comparable, low relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Ashcroft 6' Pre-Lit Cashmere Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit, cashmere mixed pine garland matching branch tip description, shorter length but very similar construction and function, quite relevant.
